author: Staff Reporter
text: A man allegedly killed his wife as she refused to go and live with him as a result of repeated family feuds here on Thursday. Ambika (37) wife of Elumalai belonging to Padavedu near Polur went to her maternal home in Perumpakkam road here as a result of a feud with his husband recently. Elumalai went to Ambika’s maternal home and tried to pacify her. As she refused to come, he strangulated her with a wire.
title: Man kills wife
